title: 24: S6E24 – "Over and Under" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark – the finale to our sixth season – we bring you four spine-chilling tales from author Joshua L. Hood, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about creepy cabins, fearsome forests, unusual entities, and immortal evils.

                                   
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
